msg.msgText: A request to create a JMS message consumer failed because the selection rule ended unexpectedly. A field or constant is expected at the end of a selection rule.

msgExplanation.p: Message Gateway can process only correctly formed selection rules.

msgUserResponse.p: Refer to the Message Selectors section in the Javadoc for the javax.jms.Message interface and to the SQL92 specification for additional guidance.
